document.full_text: syrian troops and security forces have killed at least 1,100 civilians in their two-month campaign to crush pro-democracy demonstrations, syrian human rights organization sawasiah said tuesday.
document.title: at least 1,100 civilians killed in syria uprising: group
lines_and_colors: syrian troops and security forces have killed at least 1,100 civilians in their two-month campaign to crush pro-democracy demonstrations, syrian human rights organization sawasiah said tuesday.
